column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday June 15 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions between W Fourth St and W Fifth St due to a downed pole and wires as a result of an earlier collision.
KU is on scene for repairs.  Inbound traffic diverted to Fifth St, and outbound traffic diverted to Fourth St.
UPDATE:  The roadway is back open.
